title: The Networks
text:
This section introduces the network perspectives that guide The Connections Project.
Here you can briefly describe: - What kinds of ties you model (e.g., correspondence, institutional movement, co-authorship). - How archival records are translated into network data. - How the Haynes and Miller projects fit into the broader set of networks.

title: Overview
text:
The Connections Project
Explore how archival records \(\times\) network analysis expands our knowledge of the lives and work of Black mathematicians.
